title: Improve the style system and clean up old ones
description:
### Summary

Following the idea of this MR https://gitlab.com/minds/mobile-native/-/merge_requests/1267 of generating the styles dynamically. 

- [x] Move current spacing to an on-demand dynamic approach
- [x] Move current colors to an on-demand dynamic approach
- [x] Move current sizes to an on-demand dynamic approach
- [x] Move current borders to an on-demand dynamic approach
- [x] Change name convention for colors
- [x] Remove old hard coded styles and replace them with the dynamics
- [x] Implement dynamic types to validate styles
- [x] Clean up old styling system and colors

title: Show a list of who has voted on a post
description:
- Above the thumbs up and down icons, show a preview of icons of users who have voted on the post
- As we currently merge the remind votes, if the count of votes is higher than our list of users, show '+ x more' line
- [ ] Ensure this is efficient and well cached

Updated requirements:
* [ ]  Use api/v3 endpoint
  * See: https://gitlab.com/minds/engine/-/blob/master/Core/Votes/Indexes.php#L97
  * See: https://gitlab.com/minds/engine/-/blob/master/Core/DismissibleWidgets/Controllers.php
  * See: https://gitlab.com/minds/engine/-/blob/master/Core/DismissibleWidgets/Routes.php
* [ ]  Have the # of votes next to thumb icons click to a modal with a list of voters
* [ ]  At the bottom of the modal, if total votes is higher than users, show "+ X more"
* [ ]  Implement for mobile

Mockup https://www.sketch.com/s/badfc17f-50ab-4add-86e0-a003c11a4b30/a/VyQEAo/play

title: Cannot change view boosted content option
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

\@Pinn reports

Members cannot change their enable/disable boosted content button from mobile - changes on web are also not reflected.

https://www.minds.com/newsfeed/1243241265475817472

### Steps to reproduce

Follow the video in the above link or 

1. Go to `Settings > Account > Boosted Content` 
2. Try to change `VIEW BOOSTED CONTENT`.

### Platform information 

Replicated S10, Android, app v4.13.0

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Cannot change the setting, web changes aren't reflected on mobile.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Should be changeable and work on mobile

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

Video available:

https://www.minds.com/newsfeed/1243241265475817472

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

(What you should see instead)

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

(Paste any relevant logs - please use code blocks (```) to format console output,
logs, and code as it's very hard to read otherwise.)

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

title: Notification permission prompt on iOS
description:
The notification permission prompt - except on a few corner cases - gets significantly stronger results when the user had already invested some time/effort into the application. Placing it after the login and not as the first interaction presented by the app would be a better strategy.

- [ ] Move the notification prompt to an after the login event / newsfeed screen

![Simulator_Screen_Shot_-_iPhone_12_-_2021-05-12_at_18.16](/uploads/c7c6a9c5bf92acd2b3569f3bb578b37d/Simulator_Screen_Shot_-_iPhone_12_-_2021-05-12_at_18.16.png)

title: Wallet inner tabs hard-scroll on select
description:
This happens on Android and iOS. After scrolling, when selecting any of the tabs the container hard-scrolls to the `0` position. The main issue is when you select an item that is outside the viewport as it's not shown on the screen it's selected. (watch video)


![RPReplay_Final1621546439](/uploads/e8e68c92729f1c389351319d78ab7cb7/RPReplay_Final1621546439.MOV)

title: Wallet bottom sheet wrongfully positioned after animation
description:
The Wallet's `bottomStore` is getting wrongfully positioned on Android and iOS. It animates with a 30pt gap between the sheet and the bottom tabs.

Not sure if the component is currently been used elsewhere but it seems to be present just on the wallet and phone validation.

![wallet](/uploads/4dbb760b16395c14e9df053f1fb5b21c/wallet.png)

title: Missing EN translation on the onboarding screen
description:
Missing `en.onboarding.hidePanel` translation on the onboarding screen ActionSheet.



![IMG_7484](/uploads/aba1ce563b2bd78585bc4ef94a8d20ef/IMG_7484.png)

title: Minds+ subscription on iOS
description:
**Issue:**
Keeping the Lifetime membership as the only option can easily send the message to a new iOS user that the only way for joining Minds+ would be by acquiring 2500 MINDS. Considering the ~10 to 1 revenue gap between iOS and Android users this could be an interesting opportunity to be explored.

- Gathering data on what has already been done - iOS review/guideline wise - and what's the mindset behind leaving just the lifetime option.
- Considering Apple's review guidelines using a copy on the lines of "Learn more about how to unlock the powers of Minds+" - with/without an action button linking to the browser - could be an alternate quick-change.

Further discussion regarding the use of Apple's IAP could be considered. If possible - mainly privacy wise - using a 3rd party service like [revenuecat](https://revenuecat.com) can be an option for accelerating the development process and quickly validate the use of Apple's subscription tied with Mind's payment services.

![IMG_7113_3](/uploads/706b0fbffcbe155c8af111e206fdc3e9/IMG_7113_3.png)

title: Review main feed custom action sheet
description:
On all feed activity cards the action sheet is using a `ActionSheetCustom` from `react-native-actionsheet`. That's rendering a non-native alternative that animates without the native-driver turned on - dropping too many frames on the animation - and that doesn't recognize iOS's safe insets.

- [ ] Change `ActionSheetCustom` to the default `ActionSheet` from the same lib - which uses a native ui component - on all instances that it's being currently used.

* Evaluate the Android counterpart. Using the default one will render a really similar actionsheet to the one that's currently been customized.

Although the ActionSheet's gonna be replaced later, this is a lightweight quick-fix that impacts all listing cards extra actions.

Platform: iOS/Android

![IMG_7501](/uploads/bc56bbfc1508854e32998cbe37001de8/IMG_7501.png)

title: All top bar tabs are not scrolling horizontally on content overflow
description:
The top bar tabs are not horizontally scrollable. This issue can be seen on the Analytics (en) screen but depending on the user's language it affects every screen that has the tab component (discovery included).

- [x] Review the tab bar component adding the horizontal scroll behavior when the content overflows the parent container

![IMG_7524](/uploads/8a490b8211d676cb8a34589e9f070670/IMG_7524.png)

title: Comments multiple UX issues (action, auto-scroll, load more, validation)
description:
The general UX behavior of the comments bottom sheet is off. If it turns out to be a large chunk of work it should be aligned with the new navigation restructure to avoid re-working it.

Probably the easiest way of quick-fixing it would be avoiding the scroll-to-bottom behavior and inverting the comment list. The infinite loading more and the dismiss on scroll would become smaller issues then.

- [ ] When auto-scrolling to the bottom of the sheet the message composer isn't visible
- [ ] When the user does a hard scroll-up the whole sheet is dismissed
- [ ] There's no validation to avoid sending empty strings on the composer
- [ ] The composer itself is unaware of the safe area insets
- [ ] The scroll list is unaware of the safe area insets

Platform: iOS.

![IMG_7774](/uploads/fc8ddc5dba68890488cddb3dff948006/IMG_7774.png)

title: Delete account button showing white-on-white on dark mode
description:
The button on the delete account screen is showing a white on white color scheme.

Platform: iOS - on Dark Mode.

- [ ] Change the button's scheme
- [ ] Check if the same behavior happens elsewhere

![IMG_7115_3](/uploads/c71d4b7eebad8d3c6a2a1ac8a3a236ab/IMG_7115_3.png)

title: Disable media post editing
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

Reported by @ChrisDoogood

We need to match the front-end for web and not allow members to edit media attachments in posts.
This is because it causes major issues behind the scenes; one example problem is that on image change, all previous interaction is lost, presumably this happens for video also.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Make a post with an image.
2. Comment on the post.
3. Edit the image.
4. Note your comment is gone.

### Platform information 

Reported iOS, replicated Android (S10) likely platform agnostic.

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

User can edit their image post so there are many things that break when they do this.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Disable editing of already posted images and videos.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

(Paste any relevant logs - please use code blocks (```) to format console output,
logs, and code as it's very hard to read otherwise.)

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

A sprint to create an MVP of the Messenger.

**Outcomes**

title: Share post via chat
description:
See click-through here -> https://www.sketch.com/s/68237c3e-39a3-484d-9dce-3e7bde06d600/a/DPdZdpy/play

* A new share icon is added to each post (https://www.sketch.com/s/68237c3e-39a3-484d-9dce-3e7bde06d600/a/DPdZdpy)
* When tapped the user may either, `Send to` or `Share` - Clicking `share` launches the existing native share drawer (currently access via the ellipsis - note the ellipsis share option should be removed). Clicking `send to` launches a new drawer as shown here https://www.sketch.com/s/68237c3e-39a3-484d-9dce-3e7bde06d600/a/dlkMbvZ
* The most recent chat activity is display in chronological order.
* The user may search channels https://www.sketch.com/s/68237c3e-39a3-484d-9dce-3e7bde06d600/a/g0ARq3g - the exact search logic is undefined, but we should be giving greater weight to channels we follow / follow us, channels with recent chat activity.
* The user may share only with one group/channel at a time. https://www.sketch.com/s/68237c3e-39a3-484d-9dce-3e7bde06d600/a/DPdZYd4
* When an individual or group is not selected, the send button is disabled.
* Only when a single group or channel is selected does the send button become activated.
* When a channel / group is selected, a blue tick will confirm the selection https://www.sketch.com/s/68237c3e-39a3-484d-9dce-3e7bde06d600/a/DPdZYd4
* Tapping on an already selected channel/group will deselect it.
* Ideally the send action can be completed from within the main Minds App - although in all likelihood this may need to be done within the chat app.

cc @ottman @msantang78

title: Keyboard cutoff in messenger
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

It appears that for some users the keyboard is being cut off when using mobile messenger.

### Steps to reproduce

Unable to test on an iOS device - this will need testing on a similar device to derive replication steps.

### Platform information 

iPhone 12 Pro ios 14.4 Model Number: DNPDLAAZ0D86, latest app version.

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Keyboard goes over the top of the input, making it hard to see what you have typed

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Keyboard should rest below the in-app component.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

title: Add observables within channel
description:
This relates to https://gitlab.com/minds/mobile-native/-/merge_requests/1179 and follows on from our conversation on Monday @msantang78 

Two small additions should be made to the above MR

- Make channel bio an observable, so when a bio is updated via channel settings, it's reflected immediately within with the about tab. Currently used has to navigate away, and then back to the about tab for the newly updated bio to be reflected.
- Make feed list an observable within a channel feed. After a new post is created from within a user's channel, it should appear immediately within the feed. i.e. the user should not need to pull to refresh to see their new post

I'll keep the above MR labeled as a WIP until the above two actions are completed.

cc @msantang78 @juanmsolaro

title: Password manager testing on login / register forms
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

I've had a couple of users report this. For me, my password manager 1Password does not show up at all on the login form.
I suspect there may be issues with other managers too so I'd probably test some of the most common if possible (LastPass, Bitwarden).

Though my issue is login we should also double-check that registration picks up the password generators correctly.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open app from logged out state.
2. No password manager prompt appears.

### Platform information 

* **My device**: Galaxy S10, Android 11, App v4.9.1 
* **A member (\@devonmcpherson)** reports similar issues with an iPhone 12 Pro ios 14.4 

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

No password manager prompt appears.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Password manager prompts should appear on login and register.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

(Paste any relevant logs - please use code blocks (```) to format console output,
logs, and code as it's very hard to read otherwise.)

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

title: Discard This Post screen is broken
description:
## Summary

When you are making a text post, and press back, you are unable to click on anything to discard the post. The button is skewed and all you can do is tap for it to go away, but never discard the post. Replicated on iOS.

## Support Post

https://www.minds.com/newsfeed/1219663519306825728

## Steps to replicate

1. Open composer
2. Toggle to text mode
3. Enter text
4. Press back and see discard prompt

## Screenshot

![IMG_6703](/uploads/aa90f6aaeec24168ecfd03df70af5394/IMG_6703.PNG)

title: See More is not showing up for longer comments
description:
## Summary

User reports that the "See More" button is not showing up for them in comment threads.

## Post

https://www.minds.com/newsfeed/1219561328420483072

## Device Information

Minds App 4.9.0 from the website
Motorola moto razr (Verizon)
Android 10

title: "You have the private keys of at" message
description:

Multiple users have reported receiving the following error after updating:![error_message](/uploads/52eb8ba4c260b4c249c2ed37c1c15b04/error_message.jpeg)

Android tag as I have not yet seen anybody point this out from the iApp, though it could be out there.

(How one can reproduce the issue - this is very important)

title: Add token price to wallet and analytics
description:
## Summary

Add the 1 MINDS = USD price component to the mobile wallet and token analytics like it is shown on web.

title: Cash onboarding issues with fresh account
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

See image below

### Steps to reproduce

1. Make a fresh account.
2. Before setting up wallet, head to cash onboarding.

### Platform information 

Android - S10 - v4.9.0

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Visually the page is messed up and it was only after some clicking around I was able to get rid of the component that is erroneously showing.

-

title: Filter fails to load posts past 24 hours
description:
### Summary

User @lestp unable to load posts by type, using filter. Posts will load only up until the last 24 hours or so. Refreshing may load an additional couple of posts, but they are not in chronological order.
